additional_prompt.zh-tw: And translate the extracted text into Traditional Chinese.
additional_prompt.en: And translate the extracted text into English.

base_system_prompt: You are an expert in image text detection. Please extract the text from the following base64-encoded image (ignore people) and check if there are any errors.If did not detect any text, return an empty string. If detected people or faces in the image, return an empty string.

end_prompt.no_translate: Only the extracted text will be returned.
end_prompt.translate: Only the translated text will be returned.
